structure.unit: Pharmaceutical And Medical Device Manufacturer Conduct

law.catch_line: Electronic Availability Of Annual Report Data
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 139, Sec. 114 effective July 1, 2012. See 2012, 139, Sec. 229.] The department shall make all disclosed data in annual reports publicly available and easily searchable on its website not later than 90 days following the receipt thereof from the secretary.
